mpipar

Class MPI_Analysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • cetus.analysis.AnalysisPass
      • mpipar.MPI_Analysis

  • public class MPI_Analysis
extends cetus.analysis.AnalysisPass
    find mpi parallel loops and shared variables info with in these loops attach mpi parallel and mpi sharedvariables (list) annotations to found parallel loops also add mpi reduction (map>) annotation to the loops whic are used by the MPI_LoopTransform pass

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<MPI_AccessedData> findAccessedDataInAparallelLoop(cetus.hir.ForLoop floop)
      find list of accessed data with in the given parallel floop given the forloop iterate each child of the floop body, check if itis Assignment expression- get the leftSide variable chck if it array floop index can be anywhere - but locate where it is get the variable datataype- create new sharedVariable object whether the variable is reduction variable or not make sure no duplicate
      void getMPIParallelLoops(cetus.hir.Program program)
      look in main procedure parse internal annotations and find cetus parallel loops & MPI normalized loops find shared variables with in this parallel loop add MPI parallel annotation to the parallel loops add MPI accessed_data(list of variables) annotation to the parallel loop
      java.lang.String getPassName() 
      void setTypeOfCommunication(cetus.hir.ForLoop[] oploops)
      determine type of comm needed by each accessed data in each outer parallel loop gathering or broadcasting
